home.sobreMiText: I'm Juan, a web developer with solid knowledge in React/JavaScript. I specialize in creating efficient and scalable web applications, combining clean code with intuitive interfaces. My focus is on developing technical solutions that meet both business objectives and end-user needs.

services.title: My Services
services.front: Frontend Developer specialized in creating modern web interfaces using JavaScript and React.js
services.design: Web Designer specialized in creating modern and responsive interfaces using HTML, CSS, and Figma.

bleach.title: Bleach: Thousand Year Blood War
bleach.desc: I developed a responsive SPA that presents Bleach content in Spanish, with detailed character information, fluid animations, and cross-platform adaptive design.

chat.title: Real Time Chat: Firebase
chat.desc: I developed an efficient web authentication application that simplifies the registration process to two fields, implementing Firebase for real-time user management and Firestore for data persistence.

ppt.title: Rock Paper Scissors
ppt.desc: I developed an interactive SPA of the classic 'Rock, Paper, Scissors' game with vanilla JavaScript, implementing multiple game states and a dynamic scoring system against an AI.
